post:
Hi all,

We'll try to get in early here by offering double the NVMe storage for all new QUBIT/Windows VPS orders AND all QUBIT/Windows VPS plan upgrade orders for November, 2021! No need for a coupon code, you'll see on our [Linux](https://quantumcore.com.au/linux-vps "Linux") and [Windows](https://quantumcore.com.au/windows-vps "Windows") VPS pages that all new orders automatically get double the NVMe storage.

Our cheapest package is $5 AUD per month and now has the following limits -

1vCPU
1GB Memory
~~30GB~~ **60GB** NVMe Storage
1TB Bandwidth
1 IPv4 Address

QuantumCore is 100% Australian owned and operated and the team behind QuantumCore has over 20 years of experience in the Web Hosting industry.

All of our host nodes have a 1Gb link and the Xeon Gold processes have clock speeds of 2.7GHz+.

QuantumCore servers are located in Equinix Data Centres in Sydney.

Our ping/tracert IP is: 103.246.250.3
Looking Glass: https://lg.quantumcore.com.au/

Cheers,
QC
